    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L1
    [namespace]                             1         9
    [ABC]                                   11        13
L2
    [{]                                     1         1
L3
    [namespace]                             3         11
    [DEF]                                   13        15
L4
    [{]                                     3         3
L7
    [const]                                 5         9
    [char]                                  11        14
    [*]                                     15        15
    [perPixelQml]                           17        27
    [=]                                     29        29
    [R"QML(\n    )NOTTHEND";\n)QML"]        31        5
L9
    [;]                                     6         6
L10
    [}]                                     3         3
L11
    [}]                                     1         1
EOF
